RemoteCameraProperty
=========================
``com.connectsdk.service.capability.RemoteCameraControl.RemoteCameraProperty``

Enumerates property type

Properties
--------------

UNKNOWN
   Unknown property

RESOLUTION
    Property for setting resolution

LENS_FACING
    Property for setting the front/rear direction of the lens

BRIGHTNESS
    Property for setting brightness

WHITE_BALANCE
    Property for setting the white balance

AUTO_WHITE_BALANCE
    Property for automatic setting of white balance

AUDIO
    Property for setting audio
